Text: Thank you for your referralDear Kevin Hyatt Thank you for referring for the DIR TECH POWER SVCS position at Enron You can earn up to a maximum of if this individual is hired We have contacted this person by email and assigned a tracking number as follows Person Referred Tracking Number LFPCXN Please keep this email To follow the progress of your referral use the Tracking Number above To check the status return to the Referral Station referralstation click on the Referral Tracking link and follow the easy instructions We also encourage you to visit the Referral Station at any time to refer more friends Some employees are not eligible to earn rewards for referrals and some candidates are ineligible for example contractors currently working at Enron If you have any questions about Enrons Referral Station please visit the Referral Station referralstation and click on the FAQ link in the footer You may also email your questions to Best regards Enron Recruiting NOTE If you are unable to click on a link in this email copy the URL including any part that wraps to a second line and paste it into your browser
